hymn.title: Down at the cross where my Savior died
hymn.category: Assurance and Joy of Salvation—Redeemed by the Blood

layout.singingstanza: Down at the cross where my Sav -- ior died, God's right -- eous na -- ture was sat -- is -- fied; There to my sin was the blood ap -- plied, Glo -- ry to His name! Glo -- ry to His name, Glo -- ry to His name; There to my sin was the blood ap -- plied, Glo -- ry to His name!

lyrics.stanza: Down at the cross where my Savior died, God's righteous nature was satisfied; There to my sin was the blood applied, Glory to His name!
Glory to His name, Glory to His name; There to my sin was the blood applied, Glory to His name!
Saved from our sin at this fountain, we Fully enjoy our redemption free; This we'll enjoy for eternity, Glory to His name!
Oh, precious fact, when my Savior died, Not only sin's debt was satisfied; Life's flowing fountain was opened wide! Glory to His name!
Glory to His name, Glory to His name; Life's flowing fountain was opened wide, Glory to His name!
Now both redemption and life we share, Cleansed in His blood, we're abiding there Drinking the water of life fore'er; Glory to His name!
